value-param.name: sendMailAfterRegistration
value-param.description: Switch this parameter to value 'true' if you want to be notified about registration of new user.

value-param.name: mailFrom
value-param.description: This will be used as from header in admin mail

value-param.name: mailTo
value-param.description: This should be admin mail address, where email about registration of new user will be send.

value-param.name: mailSubject
value-param.description: Subject of mail. Tokens like ${user.userName} will be replaced with real attributes of registered user in final message.

value-param.name: mailMessage
value-param.description: Content of mail. Tokens like ${user.userName} will be replaced with real attributes of registered user in final message.

value-param.name: sendingMailsEnabled
value-param.description: Parameter can be used to enable/disable feature of sending mails after some number of invalid login attempts.

value-param.name: numberOfFailedAttempts
value-param.description: Number of invalid login attempts of some user, after the mail will be send.

value-param.name: invalidLoginPolicy
value-param.description: Policy for indication that invalid login attempts are coming from same source. Valid values are SESSION, SESSION_AND_USER, SERVER. SESSION is default and it means that login attempts are coming from same HTTP session. SESSION_AND_USER is indicating login attempts of same user and from same HTTP session. SERVER means login attempts from same remote server.

value-param.name: mailFrom
value-param.description: This will be used as 'from' header in admin mail

value-param.name: mailTo
value-param.description: This should be admin e-mail address, where e-mail about invalid login attempts will be send.

value-param.name: mailSubject
value-param.description: Subject of email about invalid login attempts.
value-param.value: Invalid login attempts to portal detected!

properties-param.name: mailMessage
properties-param.description: Content of mail message, which will be send to administrator. Real content will be based on value of parameter "invalidLoginPolicy". Tokens like ${username}, ${sessionId}, ${hostname} will be replaced with real values from attacker.

property.name: SESSION
property.value: Detected ${number} invalid login attempts from HTTP session ${sessionId}, host ${hostname}. Last tried username was ${username}.

property.name: SESSION_AND_USER
property.value: Detected ${number} invalid login attempts from user ${username}, host ${hostname}, HTTP session ${sessionId}.

property.name: SERVER
property.value: Detected ${number} invalid login attempts from host ${hostname}. Last tried session was ${sessionId}, last tried username was ${username}.
